alert.note: Alert for Fond Du Lac (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fond du Lac County through 415 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over North Fond Du Lac, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Fond du Lac ASOS recorded a 55 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fond Du Lac, North Fond Du Lac, Southern Lake Winnebago, Taycheedah, Eldorado, Van Dyne, Peebles, Johnsburg, and Pipe. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 151 near mile marker 165, and between mile markers 167 and 169. Interstate 41 between mile markers 99 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
